kpi.name: M1022C12

kpi_info.title: PACKET CALL SETUP FAIL DUE TO BTS FOR BACKGROUND
kpi_info.use: The number of packet call setup failures due to BTS for background traffic class. When the PS user plane allocation fails due to BTS responding with NBAP: RADIO LINK SETUP FAILURE, NBAP: RADIO LINK RECONFIGURATION FAILURE or not responding at all.

kpi.kpi_alias: PACKET CALL SETUP FAIL DUE TO BTS FOR BACKGROUND
